1.content: Which type of world does our story take place in?
1.title: What kind of world?

11.content:
Slowly the darkness cracked open, giving way to rays of light and the greens of a lush forest. For a second it all seemed unfamiliar and hazy, like a vivid dream come to life, but something was off. The air seemed humid and heavy, the damp green moss softly tickled, if the images of a city hadn't been implanted deep into the memories that were being conflicted, this could be real.

         Grinding against the tree softly was a whimsical looking fruit that shined brightly, it seemed to beckon a adventurous nature inside. It had the feeling of a off warmth to it's bright skin, but it faded and pulsed up the arm that had touched it.

         A light, almost airy, feeling blurred the memories of a city and gave way to a reality that never belonged to a human in the modern world...
11.title: Dreams of Another Life

choices: Max, a wolf that likes to hunt humans
Kelly, a human female who is friendly with a fox
Erica, a raccoon that's a thief
Larry, a human male who is friendly with a vixen
Fred, a deer with a taste for humans
12.content:
The year is 2043. Science has produced many wonderous things by this time. Mars has a little city on it, the moon is getting populated, and genetic experiments are common. In 2017, genetic experiments gave birth to the 'Furries'
A 'Furry' is a walking and talking animal. They can do everything a human can do, plus much more. Furries come in all shapes and sizes, much like humans. Some furries are friends with humans, while other furries view humans as prey. Some furries have two stomachs, one for digesting meals and the other to store food. So....who (or what) are you?
12.title: The future

choices: Take a look at your surroundings
121.content: Your name is Max. It's the first day you're awake. Your vision slowly focuses on the humans around you... You feel like these humans are your friends, but perhaps not.
121.title: Max, a wolf that likes to hunt humans

choices: As it turns out, the snake WAS hungry enough to begin eating his captive alive
The snake furry slithered off to read a book... until he gets hungry and comes b
123.content:
Erica regreted ever listening to that slick-mouthed snake who told her about the rare valuables that dwelled within the mansion on the edge of the woods. Well, it was too late to turn back now, being that she had already scaled the walls and disarmed the security system. As she looked around, something shiney caught her eye. The Ruby Sparrow! So the snake wasn't lying! As she reached out to touch it, a voice from behind her made her jump. "Erica, I knew you'd come."
As she turned around, she saw the same snake furry that had told her about the gem. In his charming tone, the serpendine hissed, "At first, I thought you wouldn't beleive me... but I could've always gotten another meal."
"What?" she glanced at him suspiciously, swishing her fluffy tail. As she saw his naga-like arms pressing a btton on the wall, Erica attempt to leap to safty, but it was too late. Large iron shackles lept out of the ground and pulled the raccoon furry to the ground onto her back. Attempting to move but uttering nothing more than a wiggle, she watched in horror as the snake furry put her foot in his mouth. "Hmm..." he wondered aloud, "I did just eat lunch a few hours ago... maybe I should leave you here until I get hungry?"
123.title: Erica's Tale

choices: She is free and decides to get some payback on the snake!
She'll have time to get even on her own terms, first she needs to get out of her
Ack, too late! The serpent arrives back a little too early...
1232.content:
"Yesss... A meal this fine should be savored and not crammed in." The snake-like man hissed quietly, forked tongue flicking out against his lips. Ignoring the racoon's protests, he made his was back out of the room, intent on coming back when he had made some space in his belly.

Finding herself all alone, Erica's mind went into overdrive. This man had tricked her and was planning on eating her when he came back! She only had a little time, but with those cuffs around her ankles... Thankfully, a thief always comes prepared and she had hidden a lockpick on her person before heading up to the mansion. With her eyes darting to the doorway, just in case the serpent came back, she began to hastily work at the locks of those cuffs. She just needed a little more time and some concentration, then maybe she could get some payback for this betrayal. Or perhaps she would be better off simply fleeing while she had the chance and not risking a confrontation...
1232.title: The snake furry slithered off to read a book......

125.content:
Fred sulked as he tore another victim open, ripping out the throat as he brutalised the bloody neck, ignoring the screams of the male as he shook his adapted insicors back and forth vigorously, his small mouth opening slightly. "Geez, whatsa deer ta do?" he drawled, "First it was foxhunting then it was deer-hunting" he crackled his hardened hoove-stubbles that resembled fists. Fred bared his antlers for the world to see, the dark brown molted fur shortened in patches on his neck, he luckily had several bellies in which to fill, but since an unknown stranger donated the former deer to the Lilith association, he had no observations. Then he heard about the shootings, that made him mad. Some hoons liked to shoot deer for primitive sports, such as veal.

So the first thing he did was by ignoring his fleeing instinct was to attack the first hoon he saw. The gun clattered at the hoon's feet as Fred trampled on it gleefully. Then he turned to his lady Buck gratefully. Then he 'attended to' the Hoon, who was still alive. The last thing the Hoon saw was the darkness of Fred's mouth
125.title: Fred, a deer with a taste for humans

13.content:
Which made up world?

Kinetica is like our Earth but has dragons,dinosaurs,mystical creatures and extinct species.(Basically a world where nothing became extinct and magical creatures are real.) Magic is also practiced in it.
Aquanos is a world with little land to live on. Most humans live in underwater cities. And occasionally there's some sea creature around that has to feed.
Pyrareos is a planet thats surface is too hostile for human life due to poison gas and predators(Large Furries, draconic beasts,etc.) Cities are domed with glass to keep gas out and no cars are used. Large towers are constructed in the center of each one with a large buliding,the palace, on top. Some species are considered friendly enough to live inside, yet the humans may soon live inside them. Food is harvested outside the cities by people with gas suits on. This occasionally lures preds out into the open. Sometimes, some people kill them for meat.
13.title: Which made up world?

choices: Adam, the athlete and probably a meal
131112211.content: You go to a high school and are in Grade 12. You are constantly teased, but you put up with it because your parents told you so. But now you have to do a project with an athlete who hates you since you first arrived. The ironic thing is, it's an anatomy project. Perhaps you'll show him dragon anatomy in an interesting way. Whenever you see him, you lick your lips and want to eat him. At home, you lay on your bed, until the doorbell rings. You go answer it. It is. . .
131112211.title: Vorish High School Dragon

1311122112.content:
You answer the door to see a blond haired boy in the door. Most people don't like him because he's friend witha 'freak.'
"Hey, you wanna hang out?" he asks.
"Sure." you say, "Come on in." You and him go up to your room and start playing a game. You then notice something strange. You have a heightened sense of smell and smell something good about your friend. You long for live food like in the countryside. Your stomach growls and you think he would be easy prey. He is. . .
1311122112.title: Jeremy, is he friend or food?

choices: What perfect timing! Your absent partner shows!
Go hunt before Jeremy starts looking good...
13111221121.content:
Jeremy immediately glances over toward you- a dragon's belly-rumblings aren't often wise to ignore- but you continue playing as though nothing had happened, using all the self control you have, and he finally turns back to the screen of the game you play just in time to avoid losing another match to you- well, avoid for at least a few more seconds, anyway. It's not easy to do; you can't help but keep thinking of how easy it would be to stuff that delicious-smelling meal down your gullet, but... He IS your friend. And with as few as you have, if your friends start disappearing, chances are you won't be getting any others.

...Besides... With that 'partner' of yours coming to work together on your project later... Let's just say you'd rather not spoil your appetite. Biting your tongue, your hope your stomach quiets down, and just try to concentrate on the game.

...A couple of hours and more than a handful of games later, though, he's still nowhere in sight. Chances are he's ditched you, just out of spite, knowing that you need the grade enough to do the project on your own without him... Not knowing that you'll pay him back afterward, of course, in a way that will make him regret ever bothering you. ...For the few minutes he'll have left, at least. But for now, you have a bit of a problem- Jeremy's starting to get hungry himself, not to mention your own constantly-rumbling gut. It's hard to think of anything BUT food, now. And as your friend stands, glancing nervously at you and mumbling something about getting something from the kitchen, you stand too- to get something yourself, truth be told...

Something a bit more lively.
13111221121.title: Self-Control...

141112211.content:
A shadow sat on it's throne as it devised a plan.
"I never had any friends. I wish I did." the shadow said. They had a good amount of servants, warriors, etc. but no friends. They then cast a spear in front of them and saw something through it. In another realm far away. They saw a black cat with amber eyes, abnormally large ears, and a friendly look. The shadow smiled, something they hadn't done in a while. The black cat was talking to a blue one with normal ears who was wearing a uniform. The figure stood up. They walked into the torch lit room. It was. . .
141112211.title: The manipulator

14111222.content:
Claimer: I (Shadowsoul@writing.com) own Lord Axis and the Dark Overlord.
Klonoa fired a wind blast at the beast that stood before him. The evil beast looked human, but he was most likely a demon. The demon was tall, had black and red streaked hair, and wore black clothes. He could summon black balls with red rings that had spikes on them and fire at them at will. And he never ran out! His name was Lord Axis. He had proven to be a nuisance in all worlds, even those Klonoa had not ever gone too. The last time a bad guy of this magnitude was around was when the Dark Overlord, a ruler of Darkness and a race called Shadows, tried to conquer all worlds and realms.
Klonoa finally scored a lucky hit and shot the pendant that Axis had over his heart. When it shattered, Axis fell. That pendant gave Axis his powers and immortality. Axis began to grow shriveled up. He was 500 years old after all. He grew sick looking and thin.
"Why?" he said in a weak old voice. "I shall get my revenge Klonoa. Even in death, I shall strike back. Powers of Darkness, here my plea. Bind my evil to the soul of he!" Axis collapsed, dead. Klonoa turned around, pitying how he had to kill Axis in order to protect others. He hated killing. He walked home, but did not notice a black orb hovering above Axis's corpse, which had dissolved into ash. The black ball zoomed behind Klonoa and went into his back. Klonoa cried in pain for a few seconds.
"I guess he was right when he said he could strike back in death." Klonoa said. He headed home. He lived alone. He was bored. He could invite a few friends over. Ever since the Dark Overlord incident, he had a new item. It was something the Overlord had given him when he turned good. It was an object that allowed him to visit the real version of dream realms. The Dark Overlord had caused problems all over, from Kinetica(My personally created planet.) to Mobius to Lunatea to Sonic-Earth to Hyrule to Jak and Daxter's planet, and much more. He decided to invite Guntz, Popka, Lolo, Tat, Huepow, Crimson and Aquarius.
After they all arrived, Huepow was sitting on the couch talking to Klonoa while everyone else had gone elsewhere. Klonoa looked at him strangely. His mouth began to water. He snapped out of it. 'He's your friend, you can't eat him.' a voice said in his head. Another said, 'Come on, he looks good.' Klonoa then. . .
14111222.title: The Evil Within

1412211.content:
Crimson Klonoa or Aquarius?

Crimson Klonoa and Aquarius copyrighted by Shadowsoul@writing.com

Klonoa copyrighted by Namco

Descriptions:

Crimson Klonoa: Crimson Klonoa the cat is somebody who returned from the dead and was given another body. This new body and new life was given to him by the Dark Overlord, an evil being who is sealed inside another dimension. Crimson wields a ring that controls fire. Crimson can change his shape, body, colors, and voice. He cannot change his mass, however. He shows up when Klonoa is warped to Kinetica, a planet similiar to Earth. Klonoa has been framed by Crimson, and Klonoa is brought before Lord Alexander Kazati for a trial. Crimson eventually turns good once the Dark Overlord is defeated, and is given a gift by the D.O.(Dark Overlord), who also turned good. He is given a permanent form, and with permission from Klonoa, keeps his real form, which looks like Klonoa.

For a pic of Crimson, go here: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/1956...

Aquarius: Aquarius is a blue cat who posseses a ring that controls water. He is 13, but is in the miltary of the Kinetican Federation, also on Kinetica. Crimson was his brother before Crimson, then know as Pyros, died. Aquarius helps Klonoa fight Crimson before he turns good.
For a pic of Aquarius in his military outfit, go here: http://www.deviantart.com/deviation/1970...

choices: "I still want to be your friend Crimson."
14122111212.content:
Crimson put on his red T-shirt, red shorts, and red cap. He would tell his crush. He also braced himself for heartbreak if Klonoa did not love him. He picked up a black ring with runes on it.
He uttered a spell and the world around him began to grow bright. It grew black for a second, but lit back up. He was now in front of a small home. Klonoa's home. He went and knocked on the door. Klonoa answered it.
"Crimson? What a surprise." Klonoa said. "Come on in."
Crimson walked in and sat down.
"I'm sorry for interrupting whatever you were doing, Klonoa, but I have to tell you something." Crimson said.
"Yes, what is it?" Klonoa said.
"Well, you know how when I was evil and we fought eachother? Well, it turns out, in the beginning, I was using all my strength, but even as I grew stronger, I would only use a fraction of the new power because a new emotion entered my otherwise dark heart. What I'm trying to say is. . .I. . .I love you." Crimson said. Klonoa's face filled with shock.
"Well, if you don't love me, it's alright, Klonoa. I just hope we can still be friends." Crimson said before getting up and heading towards the door.
"Crimson, wait!" Klonoa said. Crimson stopped and looked at him.
"What?" Crimson said. Klonoa then said. . .

142211211.content:
Renamon frowned as her stomach gurgled yet again. She'd been eating a lot, lately. Cakes, burgers, steak, pizza... The more fattening the fare, the more satisfying it was. She'd put on over fifty pounds, gaining a pudgy, rounded gut and breasts, but still, no matter how much she ate, she was always hungry. It was getting worrisome. If only she knew what to eat...

She sighed, and prepared to go out hunting for food. Maybe if she caught some squirrels or something, that would help. She hadn't tried that yet. Hopping from streetlight to streetlight, she made her way through the city, heading for the park. She briefly paused, looking at a window, hearing interesting noises coming from it. She stared at it curiously for a moment...
142211211.title: You're a ravenous predator, lusting to fill...

14222.content: Are you human, or a digimon?
14222.title: Season 4

choices: Head towards the nearest settlement for a "snack".
Locate the children whom opposed your servents instead.
1422221.content:
How long had it been? It seemed as if an eternity had passed since you were betrayed by the very beings whom you had saved, imprisioned in a place of utter darkness. When you came to the Digital World it was torn by strife and chaos, and with your power you brought it the gifts of order and light; a perfect world was within their grasp! However they rejected your vision, and you were so sealed into the dark area. How ironic that it would be from this darkness and chaos that you would gain a far greater insight into what must be done.

The current creatures existing within the Digital World would never accept your rule; they were bound by the chains of this world. During your time in the Dark Area you had come to realize that the only way to achieve true peace, true order, would be to wipe the slate clean and begin everything again; this time with your perfect vision as the backbone. Thanks to the "assistance" of your followers you had at last been set free into the Digital World, free to begin the process of "cleansing". In the ancient past your powers had ended a great war, but if used correctly your powers could inflict damage far greater than any such battle; the destruction of the Digital World would be a swift thing. As he lifted high on your eight wings you gazed across the endless sky, taking in the flawed curropt world around you.

After a final deep breath, casting off the slight fatigue from your awakening, you prepared to begin your objective. It was at this time you were struck by a feeling you had all but forgotten. In the Dark Area you had been free of it, but now that you had returned to the Digital World the hunger of eons filled your body in an instant. It was overwhelming, however it also placed the seeds of an idea into your mind...
1422221.title: The Awakening

choices: See if Kouji is as tasty as he appears.
Give Izumi an "Arid Hug" of your own.
14222212.content:
After being sealed for a near eternity you felt as if you could consume all of the digital world and still not be sated. However your will was absolute and you forced down your hunger for the moment. Indeed it was only fitting that those whom had fought so hard to prevent your revival be the first to fill the void. There was little doubt that they were aware that you had finally been set free and so you decided to first send them a beacon to follow. Beautiful fresh air burst by as you soared high on your eight wings, quickly surveying for a suitable location. Nearby was a small village populated by approximitly one hundred digimon, mostly rookies, and it stood out as the perfect point. The distant movements of the many digimon once more sent a pang of hunger through your body but you reminded yourself that you would have a far more satisfying meal once this was completed.

As you slowed your ascent the powers of light and creation began to surround your body, focusing into your right palm. Soon it formed into a sphere within which could be a seen a mirror image of the universe itself, the Grand Cross. As you halted in mid-air you flung the ball downward towards the unsuspecting village. Moments later a massive explosion erupted in the village center, consuming many of the towns buildings. Indeed the ball had been small but it was formed of highly compressed creation energy; the big bang squeezed into the palm of your hand. There was no need to pick off the digimon fleeing from the town, afterall you needed witnesses to relate the story, but nevertheless you tossed down a second Grand Cross. The powerful explosion vaporized a number of digimon, their data rushing up on the winds to absorb into you.

When one is sealed away patience is generally the first virtue that they learn and so waiting for the Chosen Children to arrive was not so large an issue. It was likely that they were planning an ambush however your vantage point had enabled you to make out the group of humans long before they came into sight of the village, it was time to make yourself known. With a slight smile you descended at high speed and stopped directly in front of them, wind from your wings blowing against the humans. "Well well, I'm glad you finally made it. I was surprised at how well you handled Cherubimon and my knights, but I won't be quite so easy to deal with." The humans had obviously not expected you to appear so soon and all of them reached for their D-Tectors in unison. In this instant you had the time to stop any one of them. You knew well you mental warfare and decided that there was only one choice for your target.

Tomoki's D-Tector clattered to the ground as you rushed at him with your full speed and grasped tightly to his shoulders. The other tamers gasped, stalling for a moment, however they quickly realized that it was more important to evolve than to react to the attack. As the humans began to change you opened your mouth wide and pulled Tomoki upward, shoving his head snugly into your mouth. It would have been wise to first remove his hat however there was little time for this and you were instant content to taste the fabric rather than his hair. Occasional hints of his organic matter made it through however, and at the very least you could fully taste the skin of his face. There was little time to savor the sweet taste, your enemies were almost ready to begin their full assault, and you widened your throat as fast as possible. It was amazing to the tamers how fast their young friend vanished one moment he was there, though his head was obscured by your stretched cheeks, and in the next he was gone. Turning about you gave a wide smile as Tomoki's face was visibly pressing out against your expanded belly, his face locked in a scream, before he was fully sucked down into your lower intestines. In an instant your belly returned to normal, Tomoki fully dissolved, and you gave it a soft rub. "That will be that fate that befalls each and every one of you."

In a fury the other children entered their spirit forms and rushed at you in a barrage of attacks. A ball of fire burst to your left and you quickly flitted above it, directly into the path of a dark wave. A slight pain echoed through your upper body as the attack struck you, but it was altogether meaningless. Instead you turned to shake your head. As you did this you noticed that Fairymon was now descending over you behind first. You were familiar with her Arid Hug attack however it's charm effects were useless upon a power such as yours, nevertheless you dodged to the side. Now in the clear it was your turn to counter attack, but you needed to decide whom would be your next meal. The darkness user struck you as particularly tasty looking though eating their leader, even if he was unspoken, would demoralize them further. Lastly there was Fairymon. There were many ways to eat someone and her attack had reminded you of one that might be especially fitting. It did seem a tad indignate but at the same time the irony and sheer horror of your enemies would be the sweetest thing of all.
14222212.title: The battle begins

1441.title: Dragons

choices: Drake overlooked a spell that has Vorish power
His grandfather walks in with a solution
144121.content:
Claimer: I (Shadowsoul@writing.com) own Drake Shen.

Before the story may begin, let me describe Drake Shen. He is 13, has white skin, black hair, and wears shades in public. That is due to how the look in his eyes which are red seem to scare people, as his hometown in China taught him. He tells everyone his eyes are sensitive to light, and he rarely speaks, while in human form at least. He also wears a red shirt, has black pants, and has shoes that are black and red. He wears a black jacket that has a black chinese dragon with red outlines in a curled up shape on the back.
His grandfather/dragon master is the Dark Dragon. Drake is the dragon of Darkness and Sin. He also is the bearer of the Seal of Destruction, which is the Greek letter Omega colored red in a red circle burned into both his palms. His sister, Vira, is the dragon of poison and pollutants. And his distant cousin, Mana Lee, is the bearer of the Seal of Creation, which is the Octagram of Creation in a circle burned into his palm. Mana also is an expert healer and helps Jake.
Drake in dragon form is very similiar to his human form. He is black and muscular. His eyes are completely blood red with no iris or pupils. His underbelly is yellow. The Seal of Destruction in his palm dissapears, while it reappears on the back of his hands and a large Seal appears in the middle of his back. The seal is in red color when he is a dragon. There are red spikes going down his back.

Now, on to the story. . .

Drake was busy going through books in his grandfather's lair, trying to find a way to defeat the American Dragon. Even his true master, the Dark Overlord, a powerful being who was sealed inside another realm and the master of a race of monsters called Shadows, could not give him assistance. The whole reason Drake wanted to kill Jake(Jake has the Seal of Existance, which recently appeared on his palm.)and Mana was so he could obtain their seals, open the Dark Gate, and allow his master's servants entrance into this world. Then the world would be sucked into the Dark Dimension, where the Dark Overlord could rule it with more ease, since his own realm was easier to control. Drake found no success.
"I'm stronger than that damned American Dragon! But becuase of the traitors of the Lee Clan, the Shen Clan cannot defeat him!"
144121.title: Drake, the evil dragon

1452222222122.content: Sgt. Maj. Melissa Mao awoke in her bunk on Mithril's submarine with a quick start, probably just after a nightmare, hitting her head on the bunk above her and rubbing it softly. "Oh shit!" She said softly, and she looked down at the sound of her stomach rumbling. As part of a new diet and intensity training, Capt. Testarossa had commanded that noone on the ship was to eat for a week. Noone on the ship was taking it well, but Mao especially. She couldn't just sit here and starve, she needed food. But also couldn't risk being caught out of bed past curfew. It wouldn't look good for a high ranking officer such as herself.

She slid the door open, and exited in the hall, trying to be as stealthy as possible. She heard heavy footsteps to her left, and the sound of someone running to her right.

145222222212212.content:
Melissa made her way down the right hall, trying to be as stealthy as possible as she followed the sound of the running, finally spotting her lower officer Kurz stopping to pant frantically in the middle of it, white in paralyzing fear. Melissa walked over and tapped him on the shoulder, "Kurz? You okay?"

Kurz turned around with a start, seeing it was Mao and tackling her into a shadowy corner. Melissa growled and rubbed her head "What the hell was that for?" Kurz turned to her starting to pant again, looking quite apologetic "Can you keep a secret Sgt. Major?"

Melissa smirked a little "That depends." Kurz looks at her deadly serious. "Some of the crew members are disappearing. Without warning, they've been going around minding their own business, and then they vanish into thin air. Mao shook her head "They probably are off on missions or something." Kurz shook a little "I don't think so, Sgt. Major, I think something's happening to them. I think..." He trails off, looking at her in the eye "I think someone is eating them"

Melissa looks at him, realizing he's serious and trying the best she can not to burst into laughter, but then stops and looks at Kurz up and down. Maybe that wasn't such a bad idea. The Captain had said no food, but she said nothing about eating people.

14522222222111.content:
Kai was lying awake in the hotel the Bladebreakers had most recently stopped in. He was alone in the room, Tyson, Rei, and the others were in other rooms. As he stared at the cieling in his sleepless night, he heard a sound. He payed it no mind. Then he heard it again, and looked. Nothing. He heard another sound, and got up and started to look around. He looked everywhere, and even looked under the bed, chuckling. But as he stood up, he felt a hand on his shoulder.
"Ahh!" Kai used defensive reflexes as he turned around, trying to kick. But the gloved hand of the person caught it.
"Relax Kai-sama, I bear you no harm..." the voice said.
"Who the hell are you?!" Kai said, breathing deeply.
"I am your servant, Master Kai, I bring you a message..."
"S-servant? What...?"
"You, Master Kai, are the distant descendant of great and powerful being, Lord Kurotora, the Black Tiger who once ruled this world and all the bit-beasts and people within it. However, he was dethroned...he sent me to the future at that time, and now I've finally arrived here, to give you the message so you can reclaim the world for him..."
"What the hell are you talking about?"
"I am from the past, Master Kai, I will infuse you with the powers of Master Kurotora if you wish, so you can reclaim his world as your own...If I give you this power, you will become the Kaiser, and your power will be feared by all..."
Kai thought. The oppurtunity this "power" could give intruiged him. Yet he also had his teammates...
14522222222111.title: The Kaiser

He looked at his arms and noticed his gauntlets were gone, and new silver ones had taken their place, but when he tried to remove them, they wouldn't come off, they were stuck to his skin. Kai noticed he was basically the same, except his face paint had turned red, and red stripes appeared on his arms and the rest of his body in a organized pattern.
"Woah..." Kai said, looking at himself.
"You are welcome, Master Kai...good luck on your mission, be careful with those powers...and now...I'm afraid this procedure took it's toll on me...goodbye, it was an honor to aid you, my Kaiser..." the man said before collapsing to the ground, the cloak becoming hollo w as the figure inside dissapeared. 145222222221121.content:
Rei was walking around outside the hotel the Bladebreakers were staying at. Then someone, a youth wearing a dark cloak covering his whole body with a hood over his face, challenged Rei to a battle. Rei oddly found the streets clear all of a sudden.
"You are the nekojin, Rei of the Bladebreakers, correct?" the stranger said.
"Uh..yeah, who are you?" Rei said.
The figure chuckled. "I'll reveal that after we have a little match..." He raised a launcher and attached a black and red blade to it.
Rei was surprised, but drew his blade and launcher.
"3...2...1...Let it rip!" both Rei and the figure said, their blades quickly spinning into action, already grinding against eachother.
The battle seemed to go on endlessly for Rei. The attacker's blade absorbed every bit of damage it took.
"Time to end this!" the figure said. "Kurotora! Fury of Naraku attack!!!" Rei was surprised when a massive bitbeast, a black and red tiger appeared, quickly descending on Rei's Drigger, knocking it out of commission instantly.
Rei fell to his knees. "H-how?.."
The figure chuckled. "What do you think you're doing Rei? We're not finished yet...Venomous Virus of the Onigami Lord!"
Rei looked up to see the bit beast materializing, becoming solid. It rushed at him, biting him in his shoulder, his arm, his leg, everywhere until he was covered in bite marks. No blood fell from them, oddly.
"Excellent! Kurotora! Finish him off! Devouring Darkness!"
Rei looked up again weakly, seeing the tiger's open maw approaching, fangs gleaming, descending on him, it was the last thing he saw...


"Ahhh!!" Rei woke up screaming in the hotel room he was sharing with Tyson, covered in sweat. Kai and Max each had their own rooms next door. Thank goodness for Rei Tyson's snoring was so loud that he couldn't hear the scream. He breathed heavily for a bit, then sighed. "It was all a dream..." Rei said smiling. Then his eyes shifted to his body, he was wearing only undergarments, he was naked besides the boxers he was wearing. His eyes went wide open, he saw..was that a bite mark on his shoulder? No, it couldn't be...He then looked on his arm, his leg, bite marks everywhere. He was paralyzed with fear.
"B-But it was a dream..." he said silently. His thought was broken when he felt a surge of pain in his body...
145222222221121.title: The Nightmare Has Only Begun, Rei...

choices: his body began to morph into a feral white tiger...
his body morphs into an anthro white tiger...
1452222222211212.content: Rei clutched his stomach in pain, he felt as if he was burning inside. He got off the bed and tried to walk to the bathroom, grunting in pain as...
1452222222211212.title: Rei's Metamorphisis

choices: is sitting up wide awake, staring, uh oh...
14522222222112122.content:
Rei grunted as suddenly he felt his entire skin burn. He let out a scream of pain, closing his eyes, tears falling. He opened his eyes, and was surprised when he saw his hands. His fingernails...they were growing longer, almost like...claws?! Rei saw the same happen with his toenails, his eyes going wide in awe, bringing him away from the pain. He looked at his skin, strange white hair was sprouting from his pores, covering his body from head to toe. He looked at his hands, they were changing slightly, as were his feet...they were becoming paw-like. He felt pain in his face as his jaw and nose elongated, becoming a muzzle. His canines became longer, forming fang-like structures. He then felt something form just above his rump, and looked, noticing a lump growing there, and it tore through his boxers, a long tail showing itself. Rei got up, his boxers still on, and he gazed at awe at himself in the mirror in the bathroom. He was a white tiger! He was torn between how cool and odd this was, as well as the problems it might cause.
Rei walked back outside into the bedroom, sighing, looking over at Tyson's bed. Tyson...
14522222222112122.title: Rei the Anthro Byakko

145222222221121222.content:
Rei was surprised when he saw the once-sleeping Tyson gazing at him, eyes wide open.
Rei took a step back, he could have problems now. Tyson then spoke.
145222222221121222.title: Tyson's Awake..uh oh...

1452222222211212222.content:
"R-Rei?" Tyson said.
Rei nodded. "Yes Tyson, it's me..."
Tyson was looking up and down Rei's body, seeing the new anthro tiger's interesting build.
"Rei.."
1452222222211212222.title: Tyson Knows it's Rei

14522222222112122221.content:
Tyson looked at Rei and smiled. "You look kinda cool like that Rei!"
"Um, thank you, I guess..." Rei blushed, his fur hiding it.
Tyson got off his bed, walking towards Rei. He reached Rei, and his hand reached out towards Rei's cheek.
"What are you doing Tyson?" Rei said looking freaked out.
"Just making sure this is real, relax dude." Tyson said touching Rei's furry cheek for a few seconds before removing it. Tyson then blushed. "Sorry, was kinda like an urge..."
"It's okay." Rei said smiling. "Now Tyson, you'll keep this a secret right?" Rei said, nervous anew.
Tyson then replied...
14522222222112122221.title: Can You Keep A Secret Tyson?

choices: "Come to the kitchen with me, I'll explain there..."
145222222221121222212.content:
"Sure." Tyson said smiling.
Rei smiled.
"On one condition..." Tyson grinned. Rei didn't want to do anything, but he had no choice, he didn't want the rest of his friends to think he was a freak.
145222222221121222212.title: On one Condition Rei...

145222222222.title: Fullmetal Alchemist?

1452222222222.content: Wanna go for a wild ride?
1452222222222.title: Bobobo-bo Bo-Bobo

14522222222222.content:
Dan and Mab's Furry Adventures(DMFA for short) is a webcomic by Amber Williams(formerly Amber Panyko), the story started out being loosely based on Furcadia, but has since expanded into a several hundred page storyline with original characters, jokes on each strip, and many diverse characters. ( http://missmab.com/Comics/Vol_001.php - This is the first page. Almost a hundred pages into the storyline, it goes into color.)
Now, choose whether to transform Amber's creation into a story filled with vore and many other twists that may have not been intended(Just remember, anything goes unless the front page says otherwise(yaoi, yuri, whatever), or proceed to another choice. (Warning, some spoilers may be contained within the following chapters)
14522222222222.title: Dan and Mab's Furry Adventures?

145222222222221.content: Pick a DMFA character. Characters should remain like their in character selfs, though certain exception(You could make Dan gay or bi, for instance) can be made.
145222222222221.title: DMFA: Select Your Sex

1452222222222211.title: DMFA Male #1 Dan Ti'Fiona

145222222222221122.content: Abel Dimitri Rewanz? As with Dan, he's an incubus, plus he's a master at his powers, so there's no telling what he could do with them.
145222222222221122.title: DMFA Male # 3 Abel Rewanz
